nodes.text: Ryarten was an astronomical object that appeared green from space. Sometime by 2 BBY, the slicers Chio Fain and Rone were pursued by TIE fighters of the Galactic Empire above Ryarten after they attempted to undertake a job that involved slicing into Imperial property. Rone was shot down and killed while attempting to distract the Imperial fighters, giving Fain a chance to escape into hyperspace.
Ryarten appeared in a flashback sequence in the comic Target Vader 4, written by Robbie Thompson, illustrated by Stefano Landini, and published by Marvel Comics on October 9, 2019.
